about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm a full-stack software engineer with a strong foundation in Python, JavaScript, and TypeScript, currently pursuing a Master's in Automotive Software Engineering in Chemnitz, Germany. With over five years of industry experience, I've built scalable web applications using Django, FastAPI, React, and modern DevOps tools like Docker, AWS, and CI/CD pipelines. I care deeply about clean code, system design, and delivering impactful user experiences.
